params.name: vocab_file
params.description: SentencePiece file (generally has a .model extension) thatcontains the vocabulary necessary to instantiate a tokenizer.

params.name: tokenizer_file
params.description: tokenizers file (generally has a .json extension) thatcontains everything needed to load the tokenizer.

params.name: clean_up_tokenization_spaces
params.description: Whether to cleanup spaces after decoding, cleanup consists in removing potential artifacts like extraspaces.

params.name: unk_token
params.description: The unknown token. A token that is not in the vocabulary cannot be converted to an ID and is set to be thistoken instead.

params.name: bos_token
params.description: The beginning of sequence token that was used during pretraining. Can be used a sequence classifier token.

params.name: eot_token
params.description: End of text token used for infilling.

params.name: fill_token
params.description: The token used to split the input between the prefix and suffix.

params.name: additional_special_tokens
params.description: Additional special tokens used by the tokenizer.

params.name: add_bos_token
params.description: Whether to add a beginning of sequence token at the start of sequences.

params.name: add_eos_token
params.description: Whether to add an end of sequence token at the end of sequences.

params.name: use_default_system_prompt
params.description: Whether or not the default system prompt for Llama should be used.
